00008 #include "CVideoSettings.h"
00009 #include "../../sdl/CInput.h"
00010 #include "../../sdl/CTimer.h"
00011 #include "../../sdl/CSettings.h"

00014 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }
00015 
00016 CVideoSettings::CVideoSettings(Uint8 dlg_theme, bool &restartVideo) :
00017 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00018 m_showFPS(g_pVideoDriver->showfps),
00019 m_restartVideo(restartVideo),
00020 mp_CameraSettings(NULL)
00021 {
00022  m_current = -1;
00023  m_changed = false;
00024  
00025  m_Resolution.width = g_pVideoDriver->getWidth();
00026  m_Resolution.height = g_pVideoDriver->getHeight();
00027  m_Resolution.depth = g_pVideoDriver->getDepth();
00028  m_FSmode =  g_pVideoDriver->getFullscreen();
00029  g_pVideoDriver->initResolutionList();
00030  
00031  const unsigned short BUFFER_SIZE=256;
00032  char Buffer[BUFFER_SIZE];
00033  
00034  // Obtain the video driver name
00035  if (!SDL_VideoDriverName(Buffer, BUFFER_SIZE))
00036   m_usedSoftwareVideoDriver = Buffer;
00037  else
00038   m_usedSoftwareVideoDriver = "SDL";
00039  
00040  m_Opengl = g_pVideoDriver->isOpenGL();
00041  
00042  m_Zoom = g_pVideoDriver->getZoomValue();
00043  m_ScaleXFilter = g_pVideoDriver->getFiltermode();
00044  m_OGL_filter = g_pVideoDriver->getOGLFilter();
00045  m_Autoframeskip = g_pTimer->getFrameRate();
00046  m_SpecialFX = g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig();
00047  
00048  std::string buf;
00049  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(29, 11, INPUT_MODE_OPTION, m_dlg_theme);
00050  
00051  buf = "Resolution: " + itoa(m_Resolution.width) + "x" + itoa(m_Resolution.height) + "x" + itoa(m_Resolution.depth);
00052  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, buf);
00053  std::list<st_resolution> :: iterator i;
00054    for( i = g_pVideoDriver->m_Resolutionlist.begin() ; i != g_pVideoDriver->m_Resolutionlist.end() ; i++ )
00055    {
00056     if(i->width  == m_Resolution.width  &&
00057        i->height == m_Resolution.height &&
00058        i->depth  == m_Resolution.depth)
00059     {
00060      mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = i->value;
00061      break;
00062     }
00063    }
00064  
00065  buf = m_FSmode ? "Fullscreen mode" : "Windowed mode";
00066  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, buf);
00067  
00068  buf = "Mode: ";
00069  buf += (m_Opengl) ? "OpenGL" : m_usedSoftwareVideoDriver;
00070  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, buf);
00071  
00072  if(!m_Opengl) {
00073   buf = "Zoom: ";
00074   buf += (m_Zoom == 1) ? "None" : itoa(m_Zoom) + "x";
00075  }
00076  else {
00077   buf = "GL Filter: ";
00078   buf += (m_OGL_filter==1) ? "Linear" : "Nearest";
00079  }
00080  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, buf);
00081  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value = m_Zoom;
00082  
00083  buf = "Filter: ";
00084  if(m_ScaleXFilter <= 4)
00085   buf += (!m_ScaleXFilter) ? "None" : itoa(m_ScaleXFilter)+"x";
00086  else
00087   buf += "Unknown Filter";
00088  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, buf);
00089  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value = m_ScaleXFilter;
00090  
00091  buf = "Frameskip: " + itoa(m_Autoframeskip) + " fps";
00092  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 6, buf);
00093  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value = m_Autoframeskip/10;
00094  
00095  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 7, "");
00096  buf = "Special FX ";
00097  buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 28 : 20; //This adds in the switch seen in the options menu, which I think is fitting for any on/off option
00098  buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 29 : 21;
00099  buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 30 : 22;
00100  buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 31 : 23;
00101  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(6)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00102  mp_Dialog->setObjectText(6, buf);
00103  
00104  m_showFPS = g_pVideoDriver->showfps;
00105  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 8, "");
00106  buf = "Show FPS ";
00107  buf += (m_showFPS) ? 28 : 20; //This adds in the switch seen in the options menu, which I think is fitting for any on/off option
00108  buf += (m_showFPS) ? 29 : 21;
00109  buf += (m_showFPS) ? 30 : 22;
00110  buf += (m_showFPS) ? 31 : 23;
00111  mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(7)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00112  mp_Dialog->setObjectText(7, buf);
00113 
00114 
00115  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 9, "Adjust Camera Bounds");
00116 }
00117 
00118 void CVideoSettings::processSpecific(){
00119  
00120  if(!mp_CameraSettings)
00121  {
00122   std::string buf;
00123   m_changed = true;
00124   
00125   if( m_mustclose )
00126   {
00127    if(m_Resolution.width != g_pVideoDriver->getWidth() or m_Resolution.height != g_pVideoDriver->getHeight() or m_Resolution.depth != g_pVideoDriver->getDepth() or m_FSmode !=  g_pVideoDriver->getFullscreen() or m_Opengl != g_pVideoDriver->isOpenGL() or m_Zoom != g_pVideoDriver->getZoomValue() or m_ScaleXFilter != g_pVideoDriver->getFiltermode() or m_OGL_filter != g_pVideoDriver->getOGLFilter() or m_Autoframeskip != g_pTimer->getFrameRate() or m_SpecialFX != g_pVideoDriver->getSpecialFXConfig())
00128    {
00129     g_pVideoDriver->stop();
00130     g_pVideoDriver->isFullscreen(m_FSmode);
00131     g_pVideoDriver->enableOpenGL(m_Opengl);
00132     g_pVideoDriver->setOGLFilter(m_OGL_filter);
00133     g_pVideoDriver->setZoom(m_Zoom);
00134     g_pVideoDriver->setFilter(m_ScaleXFilter);
00135     g_pTimer->setFrameRate(DEFAULT_LPS, m_Autoframeskip, DEFAULT_SYNC);
00136     g_pVideoDriver->setMode(m_Resolution);
00137     g_pVideoDriver->setSpecialFXMode(m_SpecialFX);
00138     g_pVideoDriver->start();
00139     
00140     CSettings Settings;
00141     Settings.saveDrvCfg();
00142     
00143     // And close this menu...
00144     m_restartVideo = true;
00145     m_mustclose = true;
00146    }
00147   }
00148   
00149   if( m_current != mp_Dialog->getSelection())
00150   {
00151    m_current = mp_Dialog->getSelection();
00152   }
00153   else if( m_current != NO_SELECTION)
00154   {
00155    if(m_current == 0) //This is the main reason I implemented this to begin with, as I find it much easier to find the resolution I want if I can navigate both directions.
00156    {
00157     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00158     mp_Dialog->m_max = g_pVideoDriver->m_Resolutionlist.size();
00159     setValues(0, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value);
00160     buf = "Resolution: " + itoa(m_Resolution.width) + "x" + itoa(m_Resolution.height) + "x" + itoa(m_Resolution.depth);
00161     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(0,buf);
00162    }
00163    else if(m_current == 3)
00164    {
00165     if(!m_Opengl) {
00166     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00167     mp_Dialog->m_max = 4;
00168     setValues(3, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value);
00169      buf = "Zoom: ";
00170      buf += (m_Zoom == 1) ? "None" : itoa(m_Zoom) + "x";
00171     }
00172     else {
00173     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00174     mp_Dialog->m_max = 1;
00175      buf = "GL Filter: ";
00176      buf += (m_OGL_filter==1) ? "Linear" : "Nearest";
00177     }
00178     setValues(3, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value);
00179     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(3,buf);
00180    }
00181    else if(m_current == 4)
00182    {
00183     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00184     mp_Dialog->m_max = 4;
00185     setValues(4, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value);
00186     buf = "Filter: ";
00187     if(m_ScaleXFilter <= 4)
00188      buf += (!m_ScaleXFilter) ? "None" : itoa(m_ScaleXFilter)+"x";
00189     else
00190     {
00191      m_ScaleXFilter = 1;
00192      buf += (!m_ScaleXFilter) ? "None" : itoa(m_ScaleXFilter)+"x";
00193     }
00194     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(4, buf);
00195    }
00196    else if(m_current == 5)
00197    {
00198     mp_Dialog->m_min = 1;
00199     mp_Dialog->m_max = 12;
00200     setValues(5, mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value);
00201     buf = "Frameskip: " + itoa(m_Autoframeskip) + " fps";
00202     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(5, buf);
00203    }
00204   }
00205   
00206   if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)  //I left this in so that people won't be confused and believe something is wrong
00207   {
00208    if(m_selection == 0)
00209    {
00210     // Now the part of the resolution list
00211     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value++;
00212      if(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value>mp_Dialog->m_max) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00213      setValues(0,mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(0)->m_Option->m_value);
00214    }
00215    else if(m_selection == 1)
00216    {
00217     m_FSmode = !m_FSmode;
00218     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(1,(m_FSmode) ? "Fullscreen mode" : "Windowed mode");
00219    }
00220    else if(m_selection == 2)
00221    {
00222 #ifdef USE_OPENGL
00223     m_Opengl = !m_Opengl;
00224 #else
00225     m_Opengl = false;
00226 #endif
00227     buf = "Mode: ";
00228     buf += (m_Opengl) ? "OpenGL            " : m_usedSoftwareVideoDriver;
00229     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(2,buf);
00230     
00231     if(!m_Opengl) {
00232      buf = "Zoom: ";
00233      buf += (m_Zoom == 1) ? "None" : itoa(m_Zoom) + "x";
00234      mp_Dialog->setObjectType(3, DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT);
00235     }
00236     else {
00237      buf = "GL Filter: ";
00238      buf += (m_OGL_filter==1) ? "Linear" : "Nearest";
00239      mp_Dialog->setObjectType(3, DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT);
00240     }
00241     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(3,buf);
00242    }
00243    else if(m_selection == 3)
00244    {
00245     if(!m_Opengl) {
00246      mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value++;
00247      if(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value>4) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00248      setValues(3,mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(3)->m_Option->m_value);
00249     }
00250     else {
00251      m_OGL_filter = !m_OGL_filter;
00252     }
00253    }
00254    else if(m_selection == 4)
00255    {
00256     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value++;
00257      if(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value>4) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00258      setValues(4,mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(4)->m_Option->m_value);
00259    }
00260    else if(m_selection == 5)
00261    {
00262     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value++;
00263      if(mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value>12) mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value = 1;
00264      setValues(5,mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(5)->m_Option->m_value);
00265    }
00266    else if(m_selection == 6)
00267    {
00268     m_SpecialFX = !m_SpecialFX;
00269     buf = "Special FX ";
00270     buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 28 : 20;
00271     buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 29 : 21;
00272     buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 30 : 22;
00273     buf += (m_SpecialFX) ? 31 : 23;
00274     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(6)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00275     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(6, buf);
00276    }
00277    else if(m_selection == 7)
00278    {
00279     m_showFPS = !m_showFPS;
00280     buf = "Show FPS ";
00281     buf += (m_showFPS) ? 28 : 20;
00282     buf += (m_showFPS) ? 29 : 21;
00283     buf += (m_showFPS) ? 30 : 22;
00284     buf += (m_showFPS) ? 31 : 23;
00285     mp_Dialog->m_dlgobject.at(7)->m_Option->m_FontMapID = 1;
00286     mp_Dialog->setObjectText(7, buf);
00287    }
00288    else if(m_selection == 8)
00289    {
00290     mp_CameraSettings = new CCameraSettings(m_dlg_theme);
00291     m_suspended = true;
00292    }
00293    m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00294   }
00295  }
00296  else
00297  {
00298   mp_CameraSettings->processCommon();
00299   mp_CameraSettings->processSpecific();
00300   mp_CameraSettings->postProcess();
00301   
00302   if(mp_CameraSettings->mustClose())
00303   {
00304    SAFE_DELETE(mp_CameraSettings);
00305    m_suspended = false;
00306   }
00307  }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void CVideoSettings::setValues(int item, int value)
00311 {
00312  if(item == 0)
00313  {
00314   m_Resolution = g_pVideoDriver->setResolution(value);
00315  }
00316  else if(item == 3)
00317  {
00318   switch(value)
00319   {
00320    case 1: m_Zoom = 1; break;
00321    case 2: m_Zoom = 2; break;
00322    case 3: m_Zoom = 3; break;
00323    case 4: m_Zoom = 4; break;
00324   }
00325  }
00326  else if(item == 4)
00327  {
00328   switch(value)
00329   {
00330    case 1: m_ScaleXFilter = 1; break;
00331    case 2: m_ScaleXFilter = 2; break;
00332    case 3: m_ScaleXFilter = 3; break;
00333    case 4: m_ScaleXFilter = 4; break;
00334   }
00335  }
00336  else if(item == 5)
00337  {
00338   switch(value)
00339   {
00340    case 1: m_Autoframeskip = 10; break;
00341    case 2: m_Autoframeskip = 20; break;
00342    case 3: m_Autoframeskip = 30; break;
00343    case 4: m_Autoframeskip = 40; break;
00344    case 5: m_Autoframeskip = 50; break;
00345    case 6: m_Autoframeskip = 60; break;
00346    case 7: m_Autoframeskip = 70; break;
00347    case 8: m_Autoframeskip = 80; break;
00348    case 9: m_Autoframeskip = 90; break;
00349    case 10: m_Autoframeskip = 100; break;
00350    case 11: m_Autoframeskip = 110; break;
00351    case 12: m_Autoframeskip = 120; break;
00352   }
00353  }
00354 }
